entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with a few flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:16 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
